quoted_tweet.text: #4QWithCNBCTV18 | @SunPharma_Live reports an in-line set Q4 numbers. Group CFO CS Muralidharan tells @ekta_batra that the co’s board has proposed to acquire Taro Pharma for $38/sh in an all-cash deal. Also guides for high single-digit topline growth in FY24 https://t.co/p4kaIXMgFY
